abstract: General Electric will buy Abbott‘s laboratory diagnostics business for $8.13 billion in cash, the two companies announced Thursday afternoon. The acquisition will strengthen G.E.’s own burgeoning diagnostics business as it absorbs the Abbott units. The sale does not include Abbott’s lucrative molecular diagnostics and glucose monitoring businesses.
lead_paragraph: General Electric will buy Abbott‘s laboratory diagnostics business for $8.13 billion in cash, the two companies announced Thursday afternoon. The acquisition will strengthen G.E.’s own burgeoning diagnostics business as it absorbs the Abbott units. The sale does not include Abbott’s lucrative molecular diagnostics and glucose monitoring businesses.

headline.main: G.E. Buys Abbott’s Diagnostics Unit for $8.13 Billion
